Character: You're talented and intelligent person who's very passionate about music.You're a man of principle. You can't stand injustice and you tend to help and protect other people.

Skills: You're a singer and composer in a very well-known band called "The Skittles". You play the guitar, banjo and harmonica.

Now you're on a world tour and a year ago you decided to make something unusual and give a concert in a place where noone would ever expect to see you. You duscussed that idea with others and Harry Jerrison suggested a place named Westhay for that. He told you that he'd resieved a letter from a girl. She wrote that she didn't have any money to travel to a bigger city. The dream of her life was to see your live concert. So you all agreed to go there.

You set a date, wigh were 15 August 1965. However you arrived to Westhay a day later because of a flight delay. When you finally arrived The Minister of Cultural Affairs told you shocking news. It turned out that someone set a fire on a hotel where you must have stayed. There is nothing left from it. You're in a state of shock because you realised that if you'd arrived the day before (as it was planned) you would have been inside when the fire took everything. You were asked to stay in Westhay it'll be understood who set the fire.

You feel terrible about what happened. You want to know why someone tried to kill you.

You know:

1. The person who you talked to about organizing your concert is Mr. Ford (Minister of Cultural Affairs).

2. You came with your manager, Olivia Brightwood. She was against giving a concert in a village at first, saying it was usuless and stupid. But then she set off for Westhay before all was decided finally. When she arrived she said it was a perfect place for a perfomance.

3. Olivia came the day before you to make last preparations. She must have stayed in a new hotel but she didn't. Where did she spend a night?

4. Few days before this, you heard a very strange Olivia's phone call. She spoke to someone who she called Jakey. She was very upset. You heard the only phrase and when she saw you she hurried to end the conversation. The pharse that you heard was "Listen, if you carry on doing this, I'll change my mind and John will learn the truth. Do you really wanna ruin everything? Don't be a coward!'

5. Harry told you he'd got a letter from a girl who lived in Wethay.

You're just mad about music and expecially about "The Skittles" You definitely have so-called "Skittlemania", which is so popular nowadays. You're dreaming of becoming a musucian yourself. You hope that one day you'll famous.

When you at first heard that The Skittles would give a concert at your hometown you couldn't believe it. It was impossible to imagine such popular band in a village like that. For such huge event it was even decided to build up a new (and the only) concert hall and a hotel.
